original: Bergström, Valfrid Olof (Olle) Vil-he’lm, civilingenjör, Jönköping, f. 28/1/ 87 i Sthlm av verkm. Anders Olof B. o. Maria Kristina Johansson. G. 12 m. Anna Boström. Barn: Stina f. 13, 4. 34, Lars 15, revisor i HSB, Sthlm, Britta 17, förest, för ungdomsgården, Jönköp., Greta 18, g. m, trädgårds-mäst. Sture Gustafsson, Jönköp., Maja 23. ■— Mog:ex. v. norra real i Sthlm, utex. fr. KTH 09. Assist, i kemi v. KTH samt e. assist, v. SJ lab. i Sthlm t. 10, ing. o. fabrrförest. v. Jönköp. V. Tändsticksfabr. sed. 10. Led. av lokala skiljendn f. Jönköp. stad 23, arb :lösh ikomm. 28, v. ordf. i sistn. 35-40. Landst :löjtn. 28-38, styr :led. i Jönköp. landst :fören. 28-37, kassör där 28-33, styriled. i Jönköp. 1. landst :förb. sed. 33. Aktiv skytt i kl. 5, styr:led. i Jönköp. skyttegille sed. 26, dess ordf. 29-42, dito i styr. f. Jönköp. 1. skytteförb. sed. 33, led. av Skytteförb. överstyr. ’Sed. 33. SkytteGm, Jönköp. 1. skytteförb. för-tj :Gm, Jönköp. 1. landst :förb. förtj:-Sm, Riksskyttem. m. m.
translated: Bergström, Valfrid Olof (Olle) Vil-he’lm, engineer, Jönköping, born on January 28, 1887 in Stockholm to the factory worker Anders Olof B. and Maria Kristina Johansson. Married on December 12th to Anna Boström. Children: Stina (born April 13, 1934), Lars (born 1915 and works as an auditor for HSB in Stockholm), Britta (born 1917 and is the supervisor of the youth center in Jönköping), Greta (born 1918 and married to the gardener Sture Gustafsson in Jönköping), Maja (born 1923). Mog:ex. (graduated from higher secondary school for boys) at Norra Real in Stockholm, graduated from KTH in 1909. Assistant in chemistry at KTH and SJ lab in Stockholm until 1910, engineer and factory manager at Jönköping V. Matchstick Factory since 1910. Member of the local arbitration committee for Jönköping city in 1923, unemployment committee in 1928, vice chairman of the latter from 1935-1940. Lieutenant of the county council from 1928-1938, board member of the Jönköping County Association from 1928-1937, treasurer there from 1928-1933, board member of the Jönköping 1st County Federation since 1933. Active marksman in class 5, board member of the Jönköping Shooting Guild since 1926, chairman there from 1929-1942, ditto in the board of Jönköping 1st Shooting Association since 1933, member of the Shooting Association's executive board since 1933. Marksman in Jönköping 1st Shooting Association, Shooting Association's medal of merit, Jönköping 1st County Federation's medal of merit, Riksskyttem. (Swedish National Shooting Medal) and more.
